title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 86.12 - Dummy display bottles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 86.12 - Dummy display bottles

State Regulations

Dummy display bottles of liquor or wine may be furnished, given or sold to retail liquor or wine licensees, provided each such bottle
does not exceed five gallons in size, and further provided that each such
bottle shall conform with the Federal regulations governing display bottles and
bears a label identifying that the bottle is for display purposes
only. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
86.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
